titles.title: May The Mind Of Christ (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May the mind of Christ my Savior Live in me from day to day By His love and power controlling All I do and say{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May the word of God dwell richly In my heart from hour to hour So that all may see I triumph Only through His power{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May the peace of God my Father Rule my life in everything That I may be calm to comfort Sick and sorrowing{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May the love of Jesus fill me As the waters fill the sea Him exalting self abasing This is victory{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May I run the race before me Strong and brave to face the foe Looking only unto Jesus As I onward go{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May His beauty rest upon me As I seek the lost to win And may they forget the channel Seeing only Him{/lang-eng}
